column3: I never really thought of myself as depressed so much as paralyzed by hope.

All I can hope to do is instill great morality in my son and trust him along the way. The music he listens to or how he chooses to wear his hair doesn't define his moral compass, and if he wants to listen to country music and wear a cowboy hat too, that's fine.

I'm not worried about that, as I hope it doesn't come to the point where I need to take a day off. I feel pretty good right now and I'm not resting or saving for any other game. I'm just going to play whatever game is in front of me.

You accept that this civilisation could be abolished and life will begin later on after a few thousand years because that is something that has happened in the history of this planet. When you have peace in yourself and accept, then you are calm enough to do something, but if you are carried by despair there is no hope.
Hope and wishes for all that delights will sour in the midst of action not taken and words unsaid.

'West Wing' was huge. Like 'Hamilton,' it pulls back the curtain on how decision-making happens at the highest level, or at least how you hope it would be. The amount of information Aaron Sorkin packs into a scene gave me this courage to trust the audience to keep up.
We must free ourselves of the hope that the sea will ever rest. We must learn to sail in high winds.
I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
When you say a situation or a person is hopeless, you are slamming the door in the face of God.
Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
In this world you've just got to hope for the best and prepare for the worst and take whatever God sends.
The hope of a secure and livable world lies with disciplined nonconformists who are dedicated to justice, peace and brotherhood.
Every day begins with an act of courage and hope: getting out of bed.
Courage is like love; it must have hope for nourishment.
Hope is the only bee that makes honey without flowers.
Hope is the word which God has written on the brow of every man.
When we have lost everything, including hope, life becomes a disgrace, and death a duty.
It is only hope which is real, and reality is a bitterness and a deceit.
You believe that easily which you hope for earnestly.
Beware how you take away hope from another human being.
Hope is a risk that must be run.
But Hopes are Shy Birds flying at a great distance seldom reached by the best of Guns.
Chance has never yet satisfied the hope of a suffering people.
Be prepared, work hard, and hope for a little luck. Recognize that the harder you work and the better prepared you are, the more luck you might have.
Every year we celebrate the holy season of Advent, O God. Every year we pray those beautiful prayers of longing and waiting, and sing those lovely songs of hope and promise.
